website_summaries.verdict: More than just a bead maze, this activity cube is packed with a variety of fun features to keep little ones learning, exploring, and entertained.
pros: Designed with 6 sides for added stability
Features a bead maze on top and stimulating educational activities on each side
Natural construction consists of sturdy wood finished with non-toxic water-based paint
Ideal for playtime with friends or siblings
cons: Some of the wooden puzzle pieces aren't attached to the cube and can be misplaced

customer_reviews.title: She immediately loved it when she saw it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cube for our 8mo old baby for Christmas. We wanted to get her something that stimulated her brain without noise or lighting up. She immediately loved it when she saw it! It's very well made and durable. Very colorful with lots of fun activities!
customer_reviews.author: Clint Robins

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: One of the big hits of this Christmas season, both my toddler and my 4 year old are fascinated with this toy. The price may seem steep to you at first, but being a woodworker myself, I can tell you that it's extremely well constructed with a lot of router work and small details. It's sturdy enough that you'll be passing it down through your family for ages.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A. Weyrauch

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this fir my baby at 8/9 months. My baby loves this! She's not playing with all the things on the sides yet, but likes to move the balls around on top. I'm a little worried about what the wires on top are painted with though because she likes to bite it. Also the thing can tip over pretty easily when she stands up and holds the wires. I know it's not meant to be used like that, but babies will do weird things. She's fallen backwards a few times already, but i think she's learned not to do it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: happy kitty

customer_reviews.title: the quality is fantastic and the size is perfect
customer_reviews.text: After having the B. Zany Zoo for my two older kids a few years ago, I was originally leaning toward that one. I decided to go with the EverEarth because of the hexagonal shape. One thing I remember from my older two was the square shape of the Zany Zoo caused it to tip when they inevitably tried to pull up on it while learning to stand. This hexagon shape had kept that from happening so far. Also, the quality is fantastic and the size is perfect! I'm so glad I took a chance on this one this time!
customer_reviews.author: Julia J.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken with exposed metal bars. DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: Awaiting replacement to update review but for now I’m MAD. Yep* heres the UPDATE ON THE REPLACEMENT. THE SECOND ONE ARRIVED BROKEN TOO. I ended up fixing it myself. The little wooden butterflies and birds came unglued and fell apart and I had to superglue and reassembled them. Seems fine, NOW. Don’t think I’ll ever trust this company and I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mia

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's all wood and made with natural products. My oldest grandson loves it and my youngest will too when he gets to the age where he can play with it. My only complaint is the side where the child can match the shapes....because the shapes aren't attached I have now lost 2 of them. They are nowhere to be found and I have searched everywhere. So just a warning anyone who buys this to keep track of them.
customer_reviews.author: cvkv2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! We have children ranging from 1 year to 4 years that play with it and love it. It is beautifully made. It is a bit short, the 4 year old sits on her knees to play with the walls but she can stand up and comfortably play with the "maze" part. Again, I must say that the craftsmanship on this is amazing. I only paid around $70 here on Amazon for this and I feel that it was worth every penny. Especially since others (that don't look as well made) are running much higher priced.
customer_reviews.author: JTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great even for younger ones!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month loves this already! He loves to move his disks that are on a wire type thing on his jumparoo so I figured the bead maze itself would be fun for him. He's not quite gotten the hang of all the sides but still keeps him busy for quite a while. I also seeing this encouraging standing when he's ready since he wants to be in on the action of the brad maze on top. Not to mention the wooden design is adorable :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: A Classic Quality Wooden Toy
customer_reviews.text: While admittedly pricey, and undeniably smaller than you think it's going to be, this is still a high quality toy that makes an excellent addition to your baby's playroom. In a world with unrelenting digital doo dads... Toys with sounds and lights... This wooden cube is pure, simple entertainment. You'll literally see your child's wheels turning in his mind as he or she enhances fine motor schools with the assorted beads and wooden bits. Of all the toys my 4 month old got for Christmas, her wooden toys are the first toys she always chooses. They are indeed the best and they will grow with her for a while. This item does not disappoint. it is an investment well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Seems to engage my toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 13 months old has been fascinated by these activity cubes since she was 7 months old, when she saw it at My Gym. I didn’t want to own one myself given its higher price points. I finally got one and she was happy with it for a day and now she only goes back to play occasionally. Maybe the sides are too hard for her to be interesting atm?
customer_reviews.author: S.Z.Minero

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old received this for her birthday and she AND her 5 year old sister love this. We've had it just over two months and while they don't run to play with it all the time, when the kids to choose to play with it, we can usually count on them being entertained for a while! It's adorable and sturdy and the colors are cute. It's held up well so far and I love the many different types of play surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J L

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my month granddaughter. She started playing with it immediately and so did her four year old sister. The box is solid and sturdy. There were no defects, cracks or peeling paint as mentioned in other reviews. I am very happy with this toy. It is also heavy so my granddaughter can't pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: LISA G.

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would hold up better
customer_reviews.text: We have had to glue most of the pieces and animals back together on this. After 3 days we had 2 of the animals on top come apart and the about a week later 3 of the animals on the sides came apart. Nothing we couldn't fix but considering this is a small childs toy it shouldn't be falling apart like this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Miller

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought this.  Perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter and it's perfect. She plays with it daily and it is both sturdy and colorful ... Very pleasing to the eye. My daughter is almost drawn to it. The parts all move with ease and there's so many little activities all in one cute package. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Cheerful, great value
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old loves this activity cube! We have had it for 6 months and nothing has bent, broken, scratched, fallen off or discolored. All the corners are rounded, the wood is sanded to a nice soft finish, no pinch points to catch little fingers, and the little bug characters are very sweet and happy looking. Great product, great brand, for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the vibrant colors and is made of wood
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 1yo sons birthday. Love the vibrant colors and is made of wood. Non-toxic so no need to worry about babys mouth licking the toy! Seems very sturdy, in fact my 4yo likes to use as a step stool...not recommended...but has held up well. I would say the only downfall are the separate wood shapes that have magnets...they have a nice cloth bag to hold them but I can see they will probably get lost sometime in the near future. My 7yo, 4yo and 1yo have all enjoyed the toy. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, the wood surface is nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, the wood surface is nice and smooth, so many activities within the cube. Keeps a child busy for hours, absolutely great educational toy as well as entertainment. Beautiful bright colors, blocks, balls, shapes are easy to maneuver though the maze side, very sturdy. I bought this product for a 1 year old, who just now learns pull up, I will edit this review in case this happens :)
customer_reviews.author: Akinom

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Toy, Nice Quality, Comes Fully Assembled!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for my 7 month old to encourage her fine motor skills. The gears are a big hit, the bead maze too, and she also likes the critters on top. She tried to pull herself up on the toy (this was the first time she tried to pull herself up on anything) but it was slightly tipsy. I will also monitor her closely with the magnetic pieces until she grows into this toy more. The overall construction is beautiful. It arrived fully assembled with nice ties to hold beads from moving around during transport and a little bag for the magnetic parts. This would make a really pretty, high quality gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jailu

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for both my granddaughters!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this toy! Its perfect for her. She's 8 months old. The only thing is she is just starting to pull herself up to standing, and it's not strong or heavy enough to hold her so I cant leave her by this toy without being right next to her. But other then that she loves it! My three year old granddaughter also plays with it a lot. Great toy, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa HIlton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I desperately wanted a toy without lights, sounds and screens for my toddler to play with. To make him use his mind, hands and imagination the same way I did as a child. He likes play with this at night more then the day for some reason. It's everything I wanted however, I do wish the side toys were more fun the tree with the birds is boring, the pieces don't stick in place so its hard to move the pieces around specially for a toddler. And honestly i think it should come with two sets of magnet shapes just due to how easily they get lost.
customer_reviews.author: migettee

customer_reviews.title: Great item, but beware of price jump
customer_reviews.text: Bought for child’s first birthday. Beautifully crafted with a lot of activities for children to enjoy. Our only complaint is that the magnets could be a bit stronger for the shape-sorter side. They fall off with the slightest bump and are hard for our little one to put back on. Also, not a fan of the price jumping. The price jumped nearly $20 just before buying it and then went back down a week or so after purchase. Not sure we would buy from this company again after that. Very disappointed especially since we loved several of the items on their page.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hassinger

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves, so many activities!
customer_reviews.text: This smaller than I imagined so read the dimensions to make sure it's what you're looking for (I didn't). Even though it's little (maybe high shin/knee height on me standing), my daughter (got for her first birthday) loves this thing! It has so many activities. The only negative is that the magnets aren't very strong so the blocks fall off that part with a light breeze and then my dog ate them. Even without the blocks for that section there is a ton of stuff to play with on this thing. Love that it came assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My munchkin absolutely adores this cute activity toy. Now that she's older the sides grab her attention more which is great. Just make sure to keep an eye on the littles as the edges with the hard plastic can and will cut. My lo fell and she still has a scar to this day .
customer_reviews.author: Erickely Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: I actually got this for my pet Raven. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my pet Raven. I thought she would go crazy playing with it, but she wouldn't go near it. My business partner Mike sent it to his 2 year old grandson, asnd he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product but potentially harmful
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I saw this product because it is absolutely adorable and looks like it’s amazingly built. I was very disappointed to see some very obvious chunks of glue on the product that could be picked off potentially and put in the mouth of a child. I have attached pictures so that you can see it. There’s also areas where the paint is chipping off of the metal parts and I would not expect that from a non-toxic toy.
customer_reviews.author: Renee-Marie

customer_reviews.title: he loved to use this as his starting point and taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son when we was barely pulling up and starting to "walk" around at 6 months. When he actually started walking at 10 months, he loved to use this as his starting point and taking off from it. Now at one year he still plays with it and when his little cousins come over they love it too. Overall great purchase. Very nice quality. No issues with the wood and it still looks new, especially after my son uses his drum sticks on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: RSESQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our soon to be 3 year old and he loves it! He never wants to leave the doctors office or daycare or anywhere he sees this, so we got him one! Keeps him occupied for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jamissia Macklin

customer_reviews.title: A nice toy with theoretically interesting activities
customer_reviews.text: A nice toy with theoretically interesting activities, but it needs to sit on top of something to make the activities on the sides accessible. Also, the design does not allow the pegs to stay on the "branches" indicated by the numbers (they are too steep and the pegs all just roll down) so that activity is essentially unusable. Lastly, the wires at the top are a bit too close together so it can be hard to move circles.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Grigorian

customer_reviews.title: My twins love playing with all the different sides and the top
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of these activity cubes and decided on this one because it is made of wood and I thought the 6 sides would make it more stable. It has definitely lived up to my expectations. My twins love playing with all the different sides and the top. They often grab onto the bead maze on top to hoist themselves up and it doesn't budge. This is a great activity cube that I think my kids will play with for a long time. Regarding the magnets; I'm holding onto them until my kids are a bit older.
customer_reviews.author: CC26

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality activity cube. Cute modern design and six sides provide more activities. I was hoping for my 8 months old to be able to use it to pull herself up, but it is a bit too low. Also, she is a bit too young for some of the activities. Looking forward her to enjoy it more as she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Bright and colorful- baby went right for it and tried to stand and it didn’t tip over. Wood and metal - smaller than I expected but really a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and easy to get your child interested in playing with on their own
customer_reviews.text: My son wasn't that interested in it at first. But I sat down and played with It myself and he eventually came over. Now he plays with it independently, and even pulls me over to play with him. He is 1 years old, in case anyone was wondering. We've had it for a few months now. I think we got it around 9 or 10 months. It's sturdy, holds his weight.(he has legit climbed on top of it) Doesn't tip over. And he likes stacking stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: Teven

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for multiple toddlers to play!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to play with when visiting my parents house and it was a big hit with him and his cousin- both 2years old. Kept them occupied and playing together!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic high quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic high quality toy! I'm very pleased with it. Looks much more expensive than it was. Unfortunately my 21 month old is really only interested in the side that has the magnetic blocks you can remove and then put pack, but I'm sure with time she'll get more use out of this adorable activity cube!
customer_reviews.author: MissCat05

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: package came packed perfectly.... my daughter (6 months) LOVES IT. I lay her next to it and she uses her feet and her hands to play with it. I just rotate it if I think she's bored with one side. hopefully this lasts until she's old enough to play with the thing on the top... :)
customer_reviews.author: lindsey carlson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected but still a great learning device
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my Son after seeing how much he liked working with similar ones in waiting rooms. The construction is great, everything seems well attached except for the magnetically attached shapes, they are hard to keep attached. I may make a modification, replacing the magnets with higher power ones, but we shall see. My Son has played with the cube many times and certainly enjoys pulling the beads across the metal lines. I am very happy with the item and would suggest it for anyone who wants their child to have access to the same items they would have in a classroom setting.
customer_reviews.author: S. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is that one of the puzzles had numbers 1-6 and instead of 6 had 5 twice. Unable remove it. Maybe will place sticker over the extra 5
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is like the ones at the doctors office but smaller and very solid. Our daughter loves this toy, it is her favorite, it's nice and sturdy but light weight and a good size to store away when not in use. It has so many activities for her to do with a nice solid base for it to rest on. It was a well worth purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. George

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loved this and is his favorite toy. Highly reccomend! UPDATE 4/2020 I have had this product for a few months now. It had endured regular 2/3 year old shenanigans. Food, occasional flip to the side. I have also picked it up by its bead rail, which I dont reccomend doing, but it is strong and study. Definitely reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this!! She has special needs so I was a little concerned it might not be sturdy enough for her use, but it has been totally great, no issues at all!! The only thing you might want to know in advance is that the puzzle pieces are not attached to the cube, but they attach with magnets and a bag is provided for storage. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautifully designed toy and I cannot stress enough how much ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully designed toy and I cannot stress enough how much I admire some new detail each day as my 11-month-old daughter is playing with it. The edges are smooth and the paint and pieces truly well crafted. Love love this and so does my wee babe!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 10 months old daughter.She seems intrigued by the item and played with it for about 5 minutes as anyone her age would. Although some of the pieces came apart and were loose, it is very sturdy and worth the money. The only reason why I gave it a four stars, is because it is a little shorter than I thought. My 10 month old daughter has to sit, or bend over to play with it. Otherwise, I am very satisfied with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: HAS SHARP EDGES.....DO NOT BUY FOR YOUNG CHILD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our grandchildren and one of them hurt themselves on the sharp edges. I cannot understand how this was built for a young child with sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids interested
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson for his 2nd birthday. He play’s with it for long periods of time. My daughter loves me for it
customer_reviews.author: joe q

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and engaging. Doesn’t tip easily. My 7 month pulls himself up on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hexagon!
customer_reviews.text: Our son is 10 months old and LOVES this cube. He mostly plays with the magnetic blocks on one side of the cube, but I can see him playing with it more as he gets older. He's starting to like the maze on top and loves trying to move the beads around. I like that it has 6 sides. It gives him more variety when it comes to playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Variety of games for toddlers to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old daughter absolutely loves this toy. It is not very big but I can see a toddler from one year to about 3-4 years old being able to enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Maximiliano Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I'm glad it came undamaged. Second, It looks real cute and fun for the babies/kids. Third, the material is real wood and it's sturdy. I'll update this review if it doesn't last, but for now I'll wait until my baby girl opens it for Christmas. Update: y'all! My daughter LOVES this toy . WORTH IT !!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old grandson really likes this. He pulls himself up on it without any issue. It's very sturdy. I did put the magnets away for when he is a bit older. I see it being a favorite around here for awhile. Even my 9 year old grandson likes to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zamara

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 1st birthday! I discovered it at a doctors office and immediately knew we had to get one. She’s at the age where she likes to stand versus sit and I love how sturdy and well made this is. Very expensive but I don’t regret paying the price!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this activity center
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this activity center. And so does my 8 month old. It's sturdy enough for him to practice pulling himself up; the edges and corners are all sanded and smoothed out; the pieces move nicely, even the cogs; the colors are beautiful and we love that the company is environmentally responsible! Really am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJean

customer_reviews.title: Great for young ones
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this, he has been able to stand and plau
customer_reviews.author: Joan Emslie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Placed this in the kids center at a busy Urgent Care, has survived well, no breakage and young kids love it. Now missing a couple of the removable pieces (To be expected in a public setting) but most of the pieces are permanently attached.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Williams

customer_reviews.title: as he will continue to enjoy it when he gets older
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for Christmas for my 1 year old son. I was very impressed with the quality of the craftsmanship. Very attractive and lots to play with. He is still too young to understand some of the activities, but I see this as a plus, as he will continue to enjoy it when he gets older. A quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Durable Toy
customer_reviews.text: Toy has held up in my stores play room. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joselle

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy for my son
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy for my son. He got so excited when I showed it to him. It's available little smaller than I thought it would be, but is the perfect size for him. It's nice to have a well made toy and one without batteries.
customer_reviews.author: G. Recipient

customer_reviews.title: I have an ECE background and vouch that this toy is excellent! Only thing to note is that even our ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old loves this! I have an ECE background and vouch that this toy is excellent! Only thing to note is that even our 6 month old can pull it over - so do supervise! (It is heavy; he definitely couldn't pick it up, but it's able to be pulled over pretty easily).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made and came with only one tiny plastic bag. Most toys are so wasteful and use Way more packaging “plastic” than needed. Love this
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for sitting infants
customer_reviews.text: My sitting infant loves playing with all the sides. The only downside is that she wants to stand and play with the top but she can't yet. Be ready to play along side your child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought. I was hoping it was ...missing a part 😩
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought. I was hoping it was the same size you see in the pediatrician office waiting room😞 especially for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: linn

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old loves this. I love that it came all put together. Colorful and engaging. Magnetic pieces are a little weak though.
customer_reviews.author: KipKip

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best toy purchase for my little boy who is 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best toy purchase for my little boy who is 7 months old. He is a busy bee so this keeps him occupied for hours! I did think it was a little short but he pulls up on it just fine. The quality of the materials are wonderful, my husband is a contractor and even made a comment about how well built this thing was. AND NO ASSEMBLY=AWESOME buy it and you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miah Powell

customer_reviews.title: This toy is so pretty in person
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so pretty in person. Bought it for our son be he's always playing with them at the doctors office. He hasn't used it as much as I expected but I think that the older he gets the more he will use it. Anytime he is playing with it he gets extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jara  Houghton

customer_reviews.title: STEM fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun activity cube for my LO. He enjoys all sides of it. He's too little for the magnets right now, so it's nice they came in a fabric storage bag for use later. Love that this one has 6 sides and the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Niemann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for 1 year old granddaughter - never to young to teach critical thinking skills
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this toy
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy. It is well made and visually very appealing! It keeps our 9 month old occupied for 30 min-1 hour at a time. Quality product with no batteries needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship. Well made and its educational and will ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craftsmanship. Well made and its educational and will grow with my 11 month old. I boxed up all the other toys and put them away lol. Less mess to clean and no more annoying sounds :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price. Good variety of activities.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good activity center for the price. My son plays with it often and finds it pretty entertaining. His favorite is the "match the shape" activity. Good quality activity center. Our was a little rough on the edges but not enough to be concern. After 4 months of use he has not been affected by this.
customer_reviews.author: Isai Quetz

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Baby likes this toy. It is sturdy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Go with a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan. Haven't decided if I will return or not. This is the low budget, less cool version of the more expensive one. We borrowed a more expensive one from a friend and my baby likes the more expensive so much more that this one gets no attention. Also, this don't move as smoothly which is important for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: LeftHandedScissors

customer_reviews.title: 1-2 almost 3 my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son on his 1st Christmas and hes 2 bout to be 3 and he still plays with it its.such an amazing gift
customer_reviews.author: Luna goodwill

customer_reviews.title: Safety concerns
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product however the wood and corners make me so nervous with the baby.. will definitely add a rubber border around the top
customer_reviews.author: sharol daley

customer_reviews.title: It's pricey, but Totally worth every penny, keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey , but Totally worth every penny, keeps my baby busy. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Liri

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to play with it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, can't wait to see granddaughter's face when she opens this for Christmas! I wanted to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: justmyopinion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: We don't like to have too many baby things all around the house. We got this one that has lots of different ways to play with and our 8 months old baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariliana Arvelo

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took this out of the box my daughter immediately crawled over and started playing. It is sturdy and beautifully made. I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Htownc

customer_reviews.title: beautifully made. My daughter (just turned 1) absolutely loves ...
customer_reviews.text: So solid, beautifully made. My daughter (just turned 1) absolutely loves it! And so does my 3 and 6 year old haha! Seems like it will last a long time too. Since I'm expecting baby four, this is great news.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Revis

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was nice but my kids never played with it even though ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was nice but my kids never played with it even though they consistently played with other styles at friends' houses. An for the price, when I tried to resell it basically unused I got only $20 for it. Not worth the cost for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. Despite accidents the wood hasn't been warped
customer_reviews.text: This is small enough for your living room, and it's just big enough for two kids to play at the same time. Three kids is possible, but that might cause some sharing issues. My kids love it. Despite accidents the wood hasn't been warped, and there were only a two tiny spots that needed to be sanded down.
customer_reviews.author: Nemaset

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for 22 months & up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 22 months old grandson. He loves all the little parts to move around
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Thompson

customer_reviews.title: For this Expensive toy they put one magnetic on one ...
customer_reviews.text: For this Expensive toy they put one magnetic on one shape wood inside out. so the piece of wood Can't be used at all
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: We thought this would be good to expand his learning
customer_reviews.text: Toy is not well perceived by my child who has mastered his first activity table. We thought this would be good to expand his learning, but it is a little more difficult to move the balls around with chubbier hands and not using his finger tips to navigate (he still uses his palm to move things).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We put two 5 pound weights in through the whole in the bottom for added weight. By far his fav toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden toy for grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Great wooden toy for grandchildren. Very interesting to non-walkers that can sit up and play or pull themselves up on it to play.

customer_reviews.title: It's an amazing little cube
customer_reviews.text: This product was definitely assembled by someone who took the time to do it. It's an amazing little cube. Can't wait to give it to my daughter for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this. Better then I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great quality. I am very impressed with how well it's made. My daughter likes the little shape puzzle on the side best. It is cute and will keep your child busy for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I purchased this as a gift for my niece and the wood is cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Bobaloo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is perfect for my 7 month old who loves to pull herself to stand. However, the wood is cracked in multiple spots, and some are kind of sharp! I don’t have the time to deal with trying to return this and waiting for a new one to arrive. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Matt Stegner

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, lots of fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this toy. There are a lot of different things to keep him interested, lots of colors, and it's a great size - not so small that it's flimsy or easily knocked over, but not so big that it takes up too much of the room. It's very well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: JEAX2

customer_reviews.title: ( Would be really happy if Amazon sent me a new pink trapezoid with ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great- and I would give it 5 stars, but one of the magnets (the pink trapezoid) that is supposed to be a magnet came with the wrong polarity so it won't stick onto the toy :( Would be really happy if Amazon sent me a new pink trapezoid with the correct magnet on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best developmental toy for child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 16 month old and he absolutely loves it!!! He talk shapes and colors and animals and numbers. It’s amazing!!!! Highly recommended!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jarek M.

customer_reviews.title: Very high marks
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a 1 year old and she loves it. So many details. Nice product and I especially appreciate the safety care taken. I can run my finger between all parts and it doesn't pinch do to the thoughtfulness concerning safety .
customer_reviews.author: G-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. Her older brother also likes to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: she loves it, so i am happy
customer_reviews.text: Great for containing play area with a nice solid toy. Our 11 month old loves it! Wish the shape magnets were a little stronger. But overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Flea

customer_reviews.title: Of all the toys, this one gets the most use
customer_reviews.text: teaches multiple different things, great for hand-eye coordination, counting, and shape reference.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity cube but not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter for her first birthday and she really likes it. My only complaint is that it is low to the ground and not very heavy, so my very active one year old was able to climb up on it and topple it over on herself before we realized that it wasn't very stable.
customer_reviews.author: True review mom

customer_reviews.title: China can produce this quality? Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted. In fact my impression after looking over it was...is this really made in china. Wood is strong. No loose pieces. Well crafted seams. Daughter loves it. Cat loves it more. Excellent value....i dont normally say that with chinese produced items.
customer_reviews.author: 73Ottobot

customer_reviews.title: My daughter Loves it, shd is 8 mos old ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter Loves it, shd is 8 mos old and she is entertained by the side panels. Lots of interesting things to move. Looking forward to her exploring it all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for my 7 month old (and beyond)
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He's 7.5 months, but we had some friends over with their little girl who is a year and a half old and she seemed to like it too . Love all of the activities. My only criticism is that one of the shapes on the magnet side, is missing the magnet! Seems well made other wisel
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo great. Bought for.my grandson and he loves it. It proves to be a toy he returns to repeatedly. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: annamarie johnson

product_meta.title: EverEarth Garden Activity Cube. Wood Shape & Color Sorter, Bead Maze & Counting Baby Toy
product_meta.description:
The EverEarth Wooden Garden Activity Cube is a global best seller and is highly stimulating creative learning cube which has moving beads, maze, shape sorter, abacus, moving cogs, counting blocks one to ten and many more moving parts – no surface is left empty! Perfect to encourage socialising and sharing as friends can play too, to develop fine motor skills together. Made from high quality Beech and fully tested to European standards, this product is suitable for children age 18 Months +. It is also 100% FSC certified Beech and tested to EN71 standards so it is safe and durable for your child to play with.

EDUCATIONAL FEATURES:

THINKING SKILLS - Figuring out how things work is one of the best parts of play. Simple challenges to more challenging ones can help in this area. Thinking Skills are mental processes we use to do things like: solve problems, make decisions, ask questions, construct plans, evaluate ideas, organise information and create objects.

SHAPE RECOGNITION - Learning about the different shapes that exist not only broadens their knowledge of shapes but helps develop their fine motor skills as well as spacial recognition.

PROBLEM SOLVING - Figuring out how things work are one of the best parts of play. Simple challenges to more challenging ones can help in this area.

COMMUNICATION SKILLS -By role-playing, and interacting with others through play, children can begin to develop their communication skills and start to understand social interaction in a better way.

SOCIAL SKILLS -Feeling confident about yourself and being able to share your thoughts are essential to children’s development. Play can naturally do that.

CREATIVITY - Using their imagination and creativity can assist children to see the world in a new way. This helps them to become great thinkers.

HAND TO EYE COORDINATION - Teaches grasping and holding skills which leads to success in school and beyond.
SPORTS - Hand eye co-ordination can help your child to catch a ball and hit a ball with a bat.
HANDWRITING - Visual-motor integration, which is a vital skill for handwriting, grows out of a good hand-eye co-ordination base. The eyes need to guide the hand in forming the letters and making sure they stay within the lines.
READING - Eye tracking skills, which are vital for reading, can be developed through games and activities used for hand eye coordination.
PLAY AND LIFE SKILLS - Young children use this skill in learning to stack towers, build with bricks etc, and we even use hand eye coordination to tie shoelaces and frost cakes.

EVEREARTH - THE STORY

For over 39 years, EverEarth has been a global leader in the design, supply and manufacture of inventive wooden toys and gifts.
We use this strength to promote environmental care and sustainability in all we do, so that our world will be vibrant and full of life, well into the future. Because of this, we are proactive in our use of safe materials and green manufacturing. We are proud to say our carbon footprint is dramatically lower than many other factories and we truly 'tread lightly' as we live and work.
Our intricately crafted wooden toys are not only a creative and wonderful addition to playtime, they're safe, too. We stringently test everything that reaches your child's hands to an international standard, as well as producing the kind of quality toys to be proud of.

OUR PROMISE

SIMPLICITY - We make things simple so you don't have to. From concept to consumer, we are right there working with you every step of the way.
SAFETY - When it comes to children we don't take safety lightly. All of our products are put through the most stringent internal testing, as well as through third party industry approved testing labs such as BV, SGS, Intertek, etc.
QUALITY - We guarantee our craftsmanship and take pride in our work. All products that leave our production floor have gone through rigorous quality control checks at multiple levels.
ENVIRONMENTALLY CARING MATERIALS - We take pride in being proactive when it comes to using materials that are safe for our environment. In addition to using the safest materials, we are continually striving to improve our manufacturing processes.

PLANT A TREE

Join us in our initiative to plant one tree for every toy we sell! We have recently established an FSC certified forest and vow to plant one tree for every product that is purchased and registered on our site. Please visit everearth.co.uk to find out more.
We are the only Global toy manufacturer who owns its own FSC Certified forest.
When you purchase an EverEarth toy we will plant a tree for your child in our forest.
We will then send you a certificate for your child to keep and cherish demonstrating that they have planted a tree and helped the environment.
Our forest is over 8,000 hectares (20,000 acres) in size.
We educate the villagers who live and work in the forest, providing training on Forestry Management, Modern Growing Techniques, Water and Soil Protection, Fire Proofing and the use of solar energy.

To plant your tree simply visit our website everearth.co.uk

With our own forest we have an abundance supply of natural resources and better control of our supply control chain. All of the while applying sustainable practices.

CLEANING INSTRUCTIONS

To clean your product, use mild soap and water on a damp cloth. Do not use any window cleaners or cleaning abrasives as they will scratch the surface and could damage the protective coating.

WARNINGS

Some of the fixings are a choking hazard to young children.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This item stands out above the rest by combining high quality craftsmanship, fine motor skill development, and playful graphics in an item that kids love to play with. Constructed primarily of rubberwood and painted with water color based paints, our cube is non-toxic and kid safe. Complete with six sides of activities to play with, from counting beads, spinning gears, magnetic shape sorter, peg maze, sliding pegs, and spinning shapes. And don’t forget the fun wire maze on top.

SET CONTAINS:
1 x EverEarth 7-in-1 Garden Activity Cube5 x Wooden Shapes1 x Cotton Accessory Bag

See more
feature_bullets: 6 SIDES OF ACTIVITIES – This baby activity cube keeps child entertained with geometric shape sorting, counting beads, sliding animals, spinning gears and a wire bead maze on top!
NATURAL & NON-TOXIC – Made of natural hardwood and stained with non-toxic water-based paint - so it’s kid safe for curious babies and toddlers
PERFECT SIZE – Just the right height for sitting babies to hold, reach and play. Sturdy 6-sided design is less likely to tip when babies grasp and stand and care instructions- wipe clean
EDUCATIONAL TOY – Exciting colors and gadgets encourage sensory stimulation and brain development. Bead mazes encourage reach, sliders promote grasping skills, gears spur logical thinking, and more

A DURABLE CLASSIC – Just like the toy at the doctor’s office, this high-quality, classic wooden toy is designed to withstand enthusiastic toddler play. Environmentally friendly. Measures 15.7 x 14 x 15.9 inches. Comes as a FULLY ASSEMBLED TOY. For toddlers and babies age 18 months & up

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
